pullrequest.title: Adding keyboard_teleop and minor adjustments to walking action server

content.raw:
m/'.' -> turn in place
u/o -> turn around a point 1 meter (adjustable) to the left/right

I'm all  for better suggestions on key controls that are sensible and for instructions that are clear. I'm going to wait on making any more feature improvements until the AtlasSimInterface is evolved a bit more.
content.html:
m/'.' -> turn in place u/o -> turn around a point 1 meter (adjustable) to the left/right

I'm all for better suggestions on key controls that are sensible and for instructions that are clear. I'm going to wait on making any more feature improvements until the AtlasSimInterface is evolved a bit more.
